intro: The most brain-melting platformer is here even more trippy! Ultimate Edition brings you a whole new endless mode of Affinity with new themes!
description:
Reach the core of each level by slipping through a series of circular layers. Time your jumps carefully to avoid the creatures that reside within the circles and reach the next layer. As you go deeper, the action gets faster and more challenging! Can you keep up?

The standard mode includes 50 stages of mind-bending action, with 5 bosses that will test your nerves. You can also measure your time yourself in speedrun mode.

In Ultimate Edition you’ll put your skills to the ultimate test! The additional Affinity mode is a new endless mode with level after level of increasing difficulty. The progress you make each time will bring you closer to unlocking 60 new colour themes, making Circa Infinity an extremely visual experience!

This is paired with new songs and remixes of songs by Jack + Jim Fay. Hypnotic visuals and a pumping soundtrack will turn up the already intense gameplay experience.

Think of Circa infinity as a live music video, with challenging activities and psychedelic graphics!

Key features:
- world of a never-ending circle - Immerse yourself in this hypnotic world
- dazzling experience - unlike any you've seen before.
- campaign with 50 levels, 5 bosses - non-stop action!
- addition of new endless mode Affinity - with the possibility of unlocking 60 new themes
- mesmerizing visuals - with new colors Circa Infinity is more trippy than ever!
- even more pulse-pounding soundtrack - created by Jack + Jim Fay
